EmailTemplate.name: KRA Feeback Request to Others
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Performance Feedback for {!EMS_TM_Assignment__c.EMS_TM_EmployeeName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Goal__c.Resource__c},
This is to notify you that {!Goal__c.Check_In_By__c} has requested a Pulse review from you.
Please click here to submit the details.
Best Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
